documentation.xhtml: The config manager (to load/save/activate configuration data)
Relay for the magnets of this panelset
Change the operating state (e.g. AUTO, MANUAL, ...)
Start opening the cover (only enabled in AUTO mode!)
Start closing the cover (only enabled in AUTO mode!)
Start opening the cover EVEN IF WE'RE IN THE UNSAFE REGION
Start closing the cover EVEN IF WE'RE IN THE UNSAFE REGION
Abort opening/closing the cover (only enabled in AUTO mode!)
Is the CoverApertureProcedure in a busy state?
Is the CoverApertureProcedure in a healthy state?
Is the panel in a busy state?
Is the panel open or closed?
Is the panel in a healthy state?
Is the panel opening or closing or standing still?
Is the I/O in a healthy state?
The config of the top panel set
The config of the bottom panel set
The opening velocity of the panels in degrees per second (always positive!)
The closing velocity of the panels in degrees per second (always positive!)
How many seconds should be waited after disabling a magnet, before a panel may move?
The minimum distance in degrees between both panelsets
The minimum distance in degrees between both panelsets
The minimum elevation of the unsafe range
The minimum azimuth of the unsafe range
The maximum azimuth of the unsafe range
The config of the first panel of this set
The config of the second panel of this set
The config of the third panel of this set
The config of the fourth panel of this set
The name of the panel set
The closed position of the panel in degrees
The open position of the panel in degrees
The tolerance for opening, in degrees
The tolerance for closing, in degrees
Tolerance in degrees per second: if smaller than ABS(this value), then the cover panel is considered to be standing still
The offset of the panel w.r.t. north
The current measurement of the selected panels
True if safe to open or close!
Actual azimuth position of the telescope
Actual elevation position of the telescope

ST.xhtml: THIS^.parts.top._log( name := 'top', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.bottom._log( name := 'bottom', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.io._log( name := 'io', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.apertureProcedure._log( name := 'apertureProcedure', buffer := subBuffer); THIS^.parts.configManager._log( name := 'configManager', buffer := subBuffer); LOGGER( name := name, actualStatus := THIS^.actualStatus, previousStatus := THIS^.previousStatus, buffer := buffer, subBuffer := subBuffer, pHealthStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.healthStatus), pBusyStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.busyStatus));

Is the procedure busy with closing?

ST.xhtml: LOGGER( name := name, actualStatus := THIS^.actualStatus, previousStatus := THIS^.previousStatus, buffer := buffer, subBuffer := subBuffer, pHealthStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.healthStatus), pBusyStatus := ADR(THIS^.statuses.busyStatus));

parts.p1( initializationStatus := initializationStatus, operatorStatus := operatorStatus, operatingStatus := operatingStatus, config := config.p1, coverConfig := coverConfig); parts.p2( initializationStatus := initializationStatus, operatorStatus := operatorStatus, operatingStatus := operatingStatus, config := config.p2, coverConfig := coverConfig); parts.p3( initializationStatus := initializationStatus, operatorStatus := operatorStatus, operatingStatus := operatingStatus, config := config.p3, coverConfig := coverConfig); parts.p4( initializationStatus := initializationStatus, operatorStatus := operatorStatus, operatingStatus := operatingStatus, config := config.p4, coverConfig := coverConfig); parts.magnetsRelay( isEnabled := initializationStatus.initialized AND operatingStatus.manual ); statuses.apertureStatus( isOpen := parts.p1.statuses.apertureStatus.open AND (parts.p2.statuses.apertureStatus.open AND (parts.p3.statuses.apertureStatus.open AND parts.p4.statuses.apertureStatus.open)), isClosed := parts.p1.statuses.apertureStatus.closed AND (parts.p2.statuses.apertureStatus.closed AND (parts.p3.statuses.apertureStatus.closed AND parts.p4.statuses.apertureStatus.closed))); statuses.healthStatus( isGood := parts.p1.statuses.healthStatus.isGood AND (parts.p2.statuses.healthStatus.isGood AND (parts.p3.statuses.healthStatus.isGood AND parts.p4.statuses.healthStatus.isGood)), hasWarning := parts.p1.statuses.healthStatus.hasWarning OR (parts.p2.statuses.healthStatus.hasWarning OR (parts.p3.statuses.healthStatus.hasWarning OR parts.p4.statuses.healthStatus.hasWarning))); statuses.busyStatus( isBusy := parts.p1.statuses.busyStatus.busy OR (parts.p2.statuses.busyStatus.busy OR (parts.p3.statuses.busyStatus.busy OR parts.p4.statuses.busyStatus.busy)) ); processes.reset( isEnabled := initializationStatus.initialized );
